blogPost.excerpt: SwifLink provides microsite services to allow our users to have the freedom to let their creativity speak by fully personalizing the look and feel of their page while having the possibility to embed and list multiple links in only one link.
blogPost.body: SwifLink provides microsite services to allow our users to have the freedom to let their creativity speak by fully personalizing the look and feel of their page while having the possibility to embed and list multiple links in only one link.
blogPost.title: SwifLink - Sleek microsite and URL shortener - fully user customisable
blogPost.author: Faiz Khay

localize.description: SwifLink提供的微型网站服务，让我们的用户可以自由地让他们的创造力说话，完全个性化他们的页面的外观和感觉，同时有可能在一个链接中嵌入和列出多个链接。
localize.tagline: 精巧的微型网站和URL缩短器--完全可由用户自定义。

localize.description: SwifLink提供的微型網站服務，讓我們的用戶可以自由地讓他們的創造力說話，完全個性化他們的頁面的外觀和感覺，同時有可能在一個鏈接中嵌入和列出多個鏈接。
localize.tagline: 精巧的微型網站和URL縮短器--完全可由用戶自定義。

previous.excerpt: bilgge is a free service which makes you feel as if you were storing data in a real safe house. instead of saying "it uses end-to-end encryption" then asking you 8+ characters password to protect your data, it gives you power to encrypt your data by yourself in your browser.
previous.title: bilgge. - a privacy-paranoid free service for your notes and secrets

localize.tagline: 为您的笔记和秘密提供偏执狂式的免费服务。

localize.description: bilgge是一個免費的服務，讓你感覺就像你在一個真正的安全屋中存儲數據。
localize.tagline: 爲您的筆記和祕密提供偏執狂式的免費服務。
